SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = ""
: SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[],SIZE) : SET &IDX# = 1
: WHILE &IDX# LE &LEN# ! Concatinate option and its value : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, &UC4RB_NXS_OPTIONS#[&IDX#]) : SET &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_NXS_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, " ")
:SET &IDX# = &IDX# + 1 : ENDWHILE

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include is used to add action specific arguments to the string that is passed to the java command while caling the nexus jar. It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment
